description: Ground truth for k-NN similarity search validation. Each entry contains a query embedding id and the expected top-k most similar document ids in ranked order. Generated from actual cosine similarity calculations on sample-embeddings.json.

queries.description: Query using Alpha document embedding - expects Alpha as top result
queries.notes: Self-similarity=1.0; B is most similar (0.66), then E (0.58), D (0.56), C (0.52)

queries.description: Query using Beta document embedding - expects Beta as top result
queries.notes: Self-similarity=1.0; D is most similar (0.67), then A (0.66), E (0.64), C (0.54)

queries.description: Query using Gamma document embedding (docs/gamma.md) - expects Gamma as top result
queries.notes: Self-similarity=1.0; D is most similar (0.62), then E (0.60), B (0.54), A (0.52)

validationRules.description: Rankings are computed from actual cosine similarity. All positions must match exactly.
